GET /api.description: Retrieves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: Retrieves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:articleid.description: Retrieves an article object relevant to articleid provided

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

GET /api/articles/:articleid/comments.description: Retrieves an array of comments relevant to provided article_id, each containing a comment_id, votes, author, body, created_at and article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Creates and returns an object comment to relevant article id

comment.author: weegembump
comment.body: I love League of Legends, especially as it's from hit show Arcane!

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates an article object and returns updated article object

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a comment by its ID. Responds with no content (204).
